metadata.synopsis: goblin raider before/after the raid on the druid grove.
metadata.how_to_trigger: From crashsite:in reCon: oe readyattackondengoto 203, 444skip through dialogue with zevlorblow the hornSide with Minthara in the next dialogue 'Obey and open the gate'killcombatgo into den and killcombat all tieflings (in cave and druid circle)teleport S_GOB_RaiderViolent

0.speaker: Goblin Sharp-Eye
0.text: Geroff. These're my music boxes - find yer own.

1.speaker: Goblin Sharp-Eye
1.text: Get ready. Or the fun'll be over before you get any of it.
